properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 4:45PM CST until February 9 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Mississippi...

Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove affecting Leake County

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove
* until Sunday afternoon.
* At 4:00 PM Friday the stage was 25.4 feet and nearing crest.
* Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 25 feet.
* Forecast...The river will crest near 25.5 feet later tonight.
* Impact...At 25 feet...Agricultural land and low areas along and
near the river begin to flood.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive or walk through areas where water covers roadway! The
water may be deeper than it appears. Remember...Turn around, don't
drown!

Please note that forecast crests are based upon rainfall that has
occurred along with forecast rainfall for the next 24 hours.

Additional information is available at:
https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN

The next regularly scheduled update is expected between 8 and 10 AM.

NWSheadline: Flood Warning extended until Sunday afternoon
